name: 3eqtr2ri
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

body.origin:
|- wceq(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c1, c3)
-| wceq(c3, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c1, c3)
-| wceq(c3, c0)

body.origin:
|- wceq(c1, c3)
-| wceq(c1, c2)
-| wceq(c3, c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(c0, c1)
-| wceq(c3, c0)
-| wceq(c1, c2)
-| wceq(c3, c2)

comment: An inference from three chained equalities. (Contributed by NM, 3-Aug-2006.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 25-May-2011.)
